headerText: The `v-avatar` component is typically used to display circular user profile pictures. This component will allow you to dynamically size and add a border radius of responsive images, icons, and text. A **tile** variation is available for displaying an avatar without border radius.

usage.desc: Avatars in their simplist form display content within a circular container.

size.desc: The `size` prop allows you to define the height and width of `v-avatar`. This prop scales both evenly with an aspect ratio of 1. `height` and `width` props will override this prop.

tile.desc: The `tile` prop removes the border radius from v-avatar leaving you with a simple square avatar.

default.desc: The `v-avatar` default slot will accept the `v-icon` component, an image, or text. Mix and match these with other props to create something unique.

profile.desc: Using the **tile** prop, we can create a sleek hardlined profile card.

advanced.desc: Combining an avatar with other components allows you to build beautiful user interfaces right out of the box.
